Guangdong Second Normal College’s Admission Batches and Score Lines in Guangdong Province are as follows:

1. Is it a Tier 1 University?

  • Guangdong Second Normal College is admitted in the Undergraduate Second Batch (Tier 2) in Guangdong Province, and it is not a Tier 1 university.
  • The university is a public ordinary higher education institution under Guangdong Province, primarily offering normal (teacher-training) programs, as well as some non-normal programs.

2. 2025 Admission Score Lines (Referencing 2024 Data)

Since the 2025 Gaokao admission process has not yet begun, the following are the 2024 Guangdong Province Gaokao Admission Score Lines for reference:

Major Group Type Subject Requirements Minimum Admission Score (2024) Remarks
Normal (Physics) Physics, Chemistry, Biology Around 420 points General Category
Normal (History) History, Politics, Geography Around 430 points General Category
Non-Normal (Physics) Physics, Chemistry, Biology Around 410 points General Category
Non-Normal (History) History, Politics, Geography Around 420 points General Category

Notes:

  • Specific score lines will fluctuate based on factors such as the difficulty of the year’s Gaokao, the number of applicants, etc. The above data is for reference only.
  • The 2025 admission score lines will be announced after the 2025 Gaokao concludes.

3. How to Query the Latest Admission Score Lines?

  • Official Channels: The Guangdong Second Normal College official website or the Guangdong Education Examination Authority website (http://eea.gd.gov.cn/) will publish the latest admission lines and results during the Gaokao admission period.
  • Volunteer Filling System: In the Guangdong Gaokao volunteer filling system, you can query real-time admission lines for each university.
